mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT p.permission_code FROM sys_admin_role ar INNER JOIN sys_role_permission rp ON ar.role_id = rp.role_id INNER JOIN sys_permission p ON rp.permission_id = p.id WHERE ar.admin_id = #{adminId} AND p.status = 1 ORDER BY p.sort_order
